intro.title:
Hi, my
name is Max, 23.
intro.description:
I'm a newly-educated backend developer from Skive, Denmark.

I am a software developer, and the creator of a C# GraphQL library called Chart and an MVC implementation, also in C#. Most of my projects are open source and can be found found on my GitHub.

I have most of my experience from backend development, but I also work in some frontend development from time to time. I also do DevOps stuff daily on my home-server.
